description: Environmental Services requires assessment and advisory services pertaining to sustainability, energy, and climate change management for federal clients in British Columbia and Yukon.

tags: Services of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
full_summary:
=================
### EZ897-230726: Environmental Services Solicitation

#### Tender Announcement

[Date] Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites Offers for:
Environmental Services Solicitation EZ897-230726.

### Tender Details

- **Scope:** This solicitation seeks assessment and advisory services related to sustainability, energy, and climate change management for federal clients in British Columbia and Yukon. 
- **Expected Contract Duration:** Contract start date: anticipated start date of the selected contracts will be 01-03-2023; Contract finish date: envisaged end date of the contracts will be 28-02-2026, subject to an optional one-year extension period. 
- **Award Criteria:** Decisions will be based on combined scoring system for technical merit and price. 
- **Discipline(s) and Work Type:** This solicitation requests service contracts requiring expertise in environmental, sustainability, energy, and climate change management to cover federal clients in British Columbia and Yukon.

### Amendments

Amendment 6 has been issued on February 10th 2023.

### Tender Status and Closing

This tender has closed on February 16th 2023. For further information regarding the tender clarification process or offer subscription, please contact Adrianne Dunsmore at (SPAC/PSPC).
